law.catch_line: Title to and possession of goods.
law.text: Except as otherwise provided in this article, each provision of this article applies whether the lessor or a third party has title to the goods, and whether the lessor, the lessee, or a third party has possession of the goods, notwithstanding any statute or rule of law that possession or the absence of possession is fraudulent.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 32, effective January 1, 1991.
